alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:24AM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow showers continuing this morning above 5000 feet. Snow showers becoming less frequent Monday afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Areas near Buffalo Pass, Dilkon, Ganado, Kykotsmovi, Shonto and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 3 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Buffalo Pass 4 to 6 inches Dilkon 3 to 5 inches Ganado 2 to 4 inches Kykotsmovi 1 to 3 inches Shonto 1 to 3 inches Window Rock 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
